description:
Harry`s casual life as a carefree ladie`s man and leader of a group of small-time criminals shatters after a tragic gang war decimates his group and unleashed his ambitions.
Desperate to escape his squalid hometown, Harry convinces his best friend Brandon to help him join the syndicate.
Unfortunately, Harry`s ambitions corrupt him and eventually Harry kills Brandon to climb higher in the organization.
name: Harry MacDowel
